title: 10 Commandments Of Ranked LOL
body:
Thou shall not Troll
Thou shall not rage at thy Noob
Thou shall not go Afk or Leavith
Thou shall not Test New Builds or Champs
Thou shall not Blame others for thy OWN lane losing.
Thou shall Wards for thy Win
Thou shall Help Secure Dragons for thee greater good.
Thou shall realise Team work wins over thy individual skill.
Thou shall join in on team fights
Thou shall use ping effectively for Mia's, Dangers, and Assists

replies.body:
> **No Spamming**

>There aren't a lot of reasons to post the same content in multiple places. Every once in a while it makes sense to cross-post, but if itâ€™s not appropriate, the subsequent posts will be removed. Repeat offenders will be hit with restrictions. Remember, your desire to show the whole world something doesn't mean it should happen. If you want visibility on a post, post it in the right place, and make sure the content is solid.

Hey look, Riot thinks you should stop posting this!
This is the appropriate board.

You say two posts but you posted it before these two. You are the only angry person here. From what I can tell, you are the person who needs to learn from these commandments. Whenever someone says "We have already read this" or "Stop spamming this all over the place", you go ahead and be the toxic person. Anyway though, no one is coming to your defense of your continuous posting of this. So really, we are the majority and can claim a greater ownership of the community in that sense, as we are a greater portion of the community.
You have stated that you will post this more if it gets removed. That is spamming. Not only that, but it is Riot's say if it gets removed, not ours. On the first post of this I saw, you were acting arrogant and shouting "THIS IS QUALITY, UNDERSTAND THAT!", when no one else seemed to believe it was. No one is really interested in this post, and you just keep shoving it down out throats. This may be the appropriate board to post it on, and I am not saying it isn't.

TL;DR, you claim to be wanting to reduce toxicity, but as soon as someone gets annoyed at your spamming you turn out to be the most toxic person around.

So what your saying is you like afks, trolling, and ragers? thats what it sounds like. Im just trying to make the GAME better. I dont give a %%%% about the forums apart from trying to make the game batter. You and ur "majority" are not about the game at all. you just like talking %%%% on forums

You are the person talking %%%% on the forums. I am concerned by your spamming of this post and the fact that you are abusive to everyone who replies to it. This highlights the fact that you yourself may be a toxic player. I never said I was okay with AFKs, trollers or ragers. Let me quote myself here, actually.
> as soon as someone gets annoyed at your spamming you turn out to be the most toxic person around.

Does this say I am okay with ragers? No. In fact, it highlights the fact that I am bothered by your rage. You say I am not about the game at all, which doesn't make sense. If I wasn't about the game in any way, I would just post on forums more relevant to my interests. However, I am interested in League of Legends. I believe you need to take time to cool off and realise "Hey, maybe it was wrong of my to shout abuse at everyone." I would like to see the community improve, which is why the fact that you are screaming at everyone who does not like spam bothers me.

I got abused first. yea, putting me on on the defensive. There is not one positive comment on my thread. you guys have just put me down and put this post down. why wouldn't i abuse people that have a abused me. do me a favour and just %%%% off. i don't get why you feel then need to post here at all if you don't like it. You realise i don't care what u idiots think? I posted this because in game is where it matters most.

Please stop hiding behind the idea. If nobody has said anything positive then obviously you should be looking around for a hint or something crazy like that. And if you bothered to respond then you obviously do care, or you yourself are the troll.

excuse me, but ur comments have been filled with nothing but abusive and negative comments. so ur point is invalid. this post is a positive post towards better community and game play. U hating on it proves what type of player u are. case close cumpo

Please explain where I am abusive. If you call the fact that I am pointing out where you are being abusive me being abusive, then it just seems to show that you can't handle the fact that someone will call you out on your own toxicity.
bla bla bla bla bla do you ever stfu? wait... iforget .. you dont have a life outside these forums. Just leave me and my post alone? or are you so pathetic this is your highlight of your day?

I put it in game play becuase this affects game play, And i put it in miscellaneous. So what? Its 2 post? deal with it. Im not spamming. Im trying to improve the game. People like you guys are the reason its gone to %%%%. You such angry little trolls who think you own the community. piss off

i love it how its the same pathetic losers posting each time. You guys cant admit that if people listen to this post it would improve the game 10 fold. Your all trolls guys. and its funny to see you get so MAD over a little post.

You are treating everyone like filth simply because we are not interested in seeing this being posted up twenty times a day. I'm sorry, but if you want the community to improve then you may need to remove yourself from it.
twenty times a day? it got removed so i put it back up. How many times is that? yea must be twenty

I didn't say it was posted twenty times today. I merely hinted towards the possibility of it happening.
It got removed, so don't put it back up. It isn't like the community gets to remove posts. Its Riot who gets to remove posts.
all things aside, this is a post to improve game play. Do you not want improved game play?

I do want improved gameplay. We can all agree on that. I'm aware that it was meant to improve gameplay, but the spamming and insistence that every read your post is the problem. In doing so, you have become the toxic player that you don't want. You say "Thou shalt not troll", so please abide by that.
No one has commented positivity, so why should i? all you can do is put me and my post down, when all im trying to do is make a better LoL
In one of the earlier threads someone did post positively, the fact you missed that just shows that you are focused on the negative feedback.

and the fact that you continue to post here proves to me that your a loser. just leave this post along? or is your life really that pathetic you cant stop trolling me? ... wait.... i already know its pathetic. and nothing i say will stop your trolling so "meh. troll on troll
no one cares about you and your %%%%ty commandments, piss off.
thanks for your comment bro, way to bump me. cheers
individual skill wins games. Play Kat 1v5 gg wp.
have not met a kat yet that i cant shut down
And what rank are you?

Wow, you're pathetic.

Even more pathetic when I saw your other posts below.
"way to keep me bumped. LoL 2 ezy"

What a cool guy.
Thanks for another bump bra
Tell me then trolls, what board does it belong on?
and how is 2 posts spamming?
I love it out of all the Bull%%%% you people posted you couldn't answer these simple questions
Except we did...
The spam is real.
Thanks for the bump
Thanks for all your post trolls, way to keep me bumped. LoL 2 ezy
LoL the second you find you ive been playing u all along. LoL no more trolls trolling lol
Seriously tho, This is a good positive post towards better game play why u hating on it?
Haters Gonna Hate.
